title: Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS should be visible with the naked eye in the night...
content:
Comet Tsuchinshan-ATLAS should be visible with the naked eye in the night sky tonight (Oct 9). ‚ÄúAstronomers are expecting the comet to be especially vivid, possibly rivaling the brightness of Jupiter in the night sky.‚Äù
